programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: A page from the diary of John Wilkes Booth implicates Ben Gates' (Nicolas Cage) great-great grandfather as a major conspirator in the assassination of President Lincoln.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Featuring a sneak peak of USA's new series, The Rainmaker.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 2-year-old girl goes missing, her irresponsible young mother (Hilary Duff) becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Officer Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a woman in trouble and gets roped into investigating a rape; when evidence connects multiple cases, the team realizes there may be a serial rapist responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman goes missing, her boyfriend points Detectives Benson and Stabler in the direction of convicted bank robber Callum Donovan (Stephen Rea); to comprehend the impact of solitary confinement, Stabler experiences it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman was assaulted inside a synagogue; Benson is dismayed to find that Rob Miller is out on bail.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it; despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Pro Motocross Championship
programme.desc: Riders face off in Round 26 of the 2025 AMA Pro Motocross Championship at Ironman Raceway in Crawfordsville, Ind.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series Countdown to Green
programme.desc: Pre-race show with analysis, driver profiles, reports from the garage, interviews with drivers and crew chiefs, and more.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup scene shifts to upstate New York for the Go Bowling at The Glen road course race. Shane Van Gisbergen has become NASCAR's road warrior, prevailing in Mexico City, Chicago and Sonoma this season. William Byron won last week in Iowa.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series Post Race
programme.desc: Post race coverage from the latest Cup event.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault; Capt. Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins tries to root out a government worker who is withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ing√©nue ballerina discovers she's been secretly videotaped for a pornographic website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU struggles to find a serial predator who uses a date rape drug that leaves no evidence behind; Rollins receives some good news.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the squad tries to solve an assault in Central Park, they are hampered by their own blind spots and a community that is losing trust in the police.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: A special look at USA's new series, "The Rainmaker.".

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU questions a group of college roommates when one of them goes missing during COVID-19 lockdown.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman was assaulted inside a synagogue; Benson is dismayed to find that Rob Miller is out on bail.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it; despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault; Capt. Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of an accused child molester is jeopardized when the prime witness has difficulty dealing with his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler hunt for the fiend who raped and impregnated a comatose patient; the trail leads them to a doctor (Bruce Davison) whose stem cell research is funded by a billionaire with Parkinson's disease.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Lake, wounded in a gunfight prompted by the reopening of an old murder case, escapes from the hospital and takes hostage the original case's only witness (Victoria Cartagena).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect a doctor of running a bogus clinic and prescribing ineffective treatment to patients who have AIDS.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is found in Riverside Park, beaten and raped with no memory of what happened; during the investigation, Olivia must face the fact that she still thinks like a victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager is beaten after nude pictures of her are spread throughout her high school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young girl claims she was raped in the stairwell of her apartment building; Benson and Stabler race to find a witness.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad makes a quick arrest when a student is raped at gunpoint in her apartment, but the defense attorney works to undermine their police work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man sees his wife abducted while video chatting with her, but Benson finds that the victim tried to pick up the ransom herself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims that Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters) raped her while he was working under cover; when Cassidy and his lawyer utilize surprising defense methods, Detective Amaro is affected.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As a series of rapes on the Upper West Side puts the city on edge, a celebrity chef (Cybill Shepherd) fears she is the next victim when someone follows her home; Detective Benson has a hard time overcoming her traumatic ordeal.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student becomes a target after her work as an online porn star is discovered by her classmates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Voight and members of the Chicago PD travel to New York to help SVU pursue Yates, their prime suspect in a rape/murder case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: MLB Plays of the Week
programme.desc: This weekly MLB highlights show showcases the most exciting plays from the past week's matches.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from the 1973 MLB All-Star Game at the Royals Stadium in Kansas City, featuring Johnny Bench, Joe Morgan, Pete Rose and Hank Aaron.

programme.title: International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: Action from the first T20 between Australia and South Africa at Marrara Stadium in Darwin. The Aussies have won 12 of their past 13 matches in this format.

programme.title: Test Cricket

programme.title: FA Community Shield Football
programme.desc: Action from the 2025 FA Community Shield as Oliver Glasner's FA Cup winners Crystal Palace face Arne Slot's Premier League champions Liverpool at Wembley.

programme.title: The Fantasy Show
programme.desc: The Fantasy Premier League experts provide analysis and insight ahead of the 2025/26 Premier League season, as they discuss the top picks for the new campaign.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.desc: Snooker action from the 2025 Saudi Masters.

programme.title: Crouchy and Cole
programme.desc: Peter Crouch and Joe Cole visit Ally Pally to chat with Masters tournament legends about the connections between snooker and football.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: Premier League Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2024/25 Premier League season, as Southampton endured a campaign to forget and Arne Slot made history in charge of Liverpool.

programme.desc: Action from the 2025 FA Community Shield as Oliver Glasner's FA Cup winners Crystal Palace face Arne Slot's Premier League champions Liverpool at Wembley.

programme.desc: A look ahead to the 2025/26 Premier League season, as Arne Slot's Liverpool look to defend their title. Plus, Leeds, Burnley and Sunderland return to the top-flight.

programme.title: Serie A Football
